nodes.name: L-leucine:NAD+ oxidoreductase (deaminating)
nodes.rxn: L-Leucine + H2O + NAD+ <=> 4-Methyl-2-oxopentanoate + Ammonia + NADH + H+

nodes.name: L-valine:NAD+ oxidoreductase(deaminating)
nodes.rxn: L-Valine + H2O + NAD+ <=> 3-Methyl-2-oxobutanoic acid + Ammonia + NADH + H+

nodes.name: L-Isoleucine:NAD+ oxidoreductase(deaminating)
nodes.rxn: L-Isoleucine + NAD+ + H2O <=> (S)-3-Methyl-2-oxopentanoic acid + Ammonia + NADH + H+
